name: 2023 3rd International Conference on Smart City and Green Energy
content: Publication Information for ICSCGE 2023: Accepted papers will be published in ICSCGE 2023 International Conference Proceedings, which will be submitted to major databases for indexing. Selected papers with extented version will be published in International Journal of Smart Grid and Clean Energy, which will be indexed by Inspec, EBSCO, Ulrich's Periodicals Directory, Google Scholar, Crossref, etc.
